basejump
  • Reference
  • News

Microtiter Plate Well Identifiers

Microtiter Plate Well Identifiers

microplate(plates = 1L, wells = 96L, controls = 0L, prefix = NULL)

Arguments

plates

Number of plates.
wells

Number of wells (96, 384).
controls

Number of control wells.
prefix

Optional. Plate name prefix.

Value

data.frame.

Examples

# Single 96-well plate
microplate(wells = 96L)
#>  [1] "1-A01" "1-A02" "1-A03" "1-A04" "1-A05" "1-A06" "1-A07" "1-A08" "1-A09"
#> [10] "1-A10" "1-A11" "1-A12" "1-B01" "1-B02" "1-B03" "1-B04" "1-B05" "1-B06"
#> [19] "1-B07" "1-B08" "1-B09" "1-B10" "1-B11" "1-B12" "1-C01" "1-C02" "1-C03"
#> [28] "1-C04" "1-C05" "1-C06" "1-C07" "1-C08" "1-C09" "1-C10" "1-C11" "1-C12"
#> [37] "1-D01" "1-D02" "1-D03" "1-D04" "1-D05" "1-D06" "1-D07" "1-D08" "1-D09"
#> [46] "1-D10" "1-D11" "1-D12" "1-E01" "1-E02" "1-E03" "1-E04" "1-E05" "1-E06"
#> [55] "1-E07" "1-E08" "1-E09" "1-E10" "1-E11" "1-E12" "1-F01" "1-F02" "1-F03"
#> [64] "1-F04" "1-F05" "1-F06" "1-F07" "1-F08" "1-F09" "1-F10" "1-F11" "1-F12"
#> [73] "1-G01" "1-G02" "1-G03" "1-G04" "1-G05" "1-G06" "1-G07" "1-G08" "1-G09"
#> [82] "1-G10" "1-G11" "1-G12" "1-H01" "1-H02" "1-H03" "1-H04" "1-H05" "1-H06"
#> [91] "1-H07" "1-H08" "1-H09" "1-H10" "1-H11" "1-H12"

# 2 96-well plates
microplate(plates = 2L, wells = 96L)

# 2 96-well plates with 6 control wells per plate
microplate(plates = 2L, wells = 96L, controls = 6L)
#>   [1] "1-A07" "1-A08" "1-A09" "1-A10" "1-A11" "1-A12" "1-B01" "1-B02" "1-B03"
#>  [10] "1-B04" "1-B05" "1-B06" "1-B07" "1-B08" "1-B09" "1-B10" "1-B11" "1-B12"
